name: Pullman Bangkok King Power

reviews.text: We bought the CX holidays package from HKG, which is a good deal as we comparison-shopped with other travel agencies and stayed at the Pullman King Power hotel. The location is not bad, just a 7-minute walk to the BTS station (Victory Monument, 3 stops north of Siam). And the hotel even provides free Tuk Tuk to and from the station.
reviews.title: Excellent Value and Friendly Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The style of the hotel is trendy, minimalist and modern. Lots of dark wood and white color. Something I am still not 100% used to is the bathroom style which is very connected to the rest of the hotel room (they use sliding panel and door to give it a more "open" feel to the bathroom) as the sound (like toilet flushing) can be heard very clearly in the bedroom area.
reviews.title: High Quality Hotel, High Quality staff

reviews.text: Standard breakfast buffet at the hotel restaurant is included daily. The selection is pretty good. Nothing too fancy or memorable, but the food does not come across as "cheap" or bad quality either. I particulary like their made-to-order BBQ pork noodle soup section.

reviews.title: Benefits for Accor loyalty program
reviews.text: Professional,friendly staffs, especially front desk agents K.Roj, K.Ticha and receptionist at the front door K.Serm. My room was spotless,amazingly clean,thanks to the housekeeper on 7th floor. Pool bar attendants were not that friendly,but it's ok. I am an Accor loyalty program card holder, but i was not informed about my benefit/discount in certain outlet at the hotel. If you are holding the loyalty card,please do ask first at the front desk upon check-in to clarify your benefit since discount does not apply in some outlet/restaurant at this hotel and most Pullman brand.

Stayed at the Pullman King Power with my wife and 9 month old daughter during our vacation to Bangkok. If I can sum it up quickly we liked it so much that we extended our stay one night just to enjoy the comfortable room, the amazing swimming pool, the unbelievable breakfast buffet and of course the friendliest hotel staff I've ever met while traveling. I could seriously go on here about how excellent it was but I don't want to bore you. Staff was super super friendly and they catered to our babies needs without hesitation. The baby bed was initially a surprise because it was more like a playpen than a crib but it had a soft cushion bottom and baby sized feather duvet. For 9 months our baby has never ever slept as good as she did in this bed. What a relief for tired parents. In fact we (including the baby) loved the duvet and child sized pillow so much we purchased them fro the hotel. And for only 450 baht. Bargain for a feather duvet.
reviews.title: Wow, an amazing experience and will stay at the Pullman again and again....

description: Pullman Bangkok King Power, the City's latest upscale hotel with an enviable location offers easy access to all major parts of Bangkok via the BTS sky train and expressway. The hotel's 386 rooms and suites adjoining the King Power Duty Free Complex, with direct access to a myriad of shopping boutiques without the traffic hassle. The hotel'€™s six dining venues, excellent business facilities and ballroom provide an ideal venue for business meetings and wedding banquets.
